nodes.text: The Urban Bombadier was a military version of the Urban Navigator speeder bike, manufactured by Aratech Corporation and used by the Galactic Republic during the Mandalorian Wars. In this configuration the original sidecar was replaced with a weapons array, capable of firing both lasers and missiles along the forward axis of travel.

During the Mandalorian Wars, Urban Bombardiers saw action on many worlds across the Republic. Designed with urban combat in mind, they helped to equalize advantage Mandalorians had by using their jet packs and Basilisk war droids.
